meanings.definition: A type of unsaturated fat found in certain foods.
meanings.sent1: Monounsaturates are good for your health when consumed in moderation.
meanings.sent2: I try to include monounsaturates like avocados and nuts in my diet.
meanings.sent3: Why did the monounsaturates go to the party? To mingle with the other healthy fats!
meanings.sent4: Her diet was a canvas painted with the vibrant colors of monounsaturates.
meanings.sent5: The monounsaturates danced gracefully on the plate, enticing everyone to take a bite.

meanings.definition: To describe a diet high in monounsaturates.
meanings.sent1: She monounsaturates her meals to maintain a balanced intake of fats.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend monounsaturates as part of a heart-healthy diet.
meanings.sent3: The chef monounsaturates her dishes with precision, creating flavorful masterpieces.
meanings.sent4: His words monounsaturates the importance of a well-rounded nutritional plan.
meanings.sent5: The book eloquently monounsaturates the benefits of incorporating healthy fats.

meanings.definition: The monounsaturates in olive oil are considered healthy fats.
meanings.sent1: Olive oil's monounsaturates make it a popular choice for cooking.
meanings.sent2: Many nutritionists emphasize the importance of including monounsaturates in your meals.
meanings.sent3: The monounsaturates in olive oil whispered to the vegetables, 'We bring flavor and health!'
meanings.sent4: In the world of fats, monounsaturates shine like a beacon of wellness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the kitchen was filled with the comforting scent of monounsaturates cooking.
